## getVertexBufferLength() function

Get the length of a vertex buffer by specified structure type of the vertex buffer

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function getVertexBufferLength(vertexBufferType: PBStructTypeInfo): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  vertexBufferType | [PBStructTypeInfo](doc/markdown/./device.pbstructtypeinfo.md) | The structure type of the vertex buffer |

**Returns:**

number

The length of the vertex buffer
